entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Island Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -37.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:57 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:57 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 33. POP 30%
